verses.verse: And Adam <WH121> knew <WH3045> <WH853> Eve <WH2332> his wife; <WH802> and she conceived, <WH2029> and bore <WH3205> <WH853> Cain, <WH7014> and said, <WH559> I have gotten <WH7069> a man <WH376> from <WH854> the LORD. <WH3068>

And she again <WH3254> bore <WH3205> <WH853> his brother <WH251> <WH853> Abel. <WH1893> And Abel <WH1893> was <WH1961> a keeper <WH7462> of sheep, <WH6629> but Cain <WH7014> was <WH1961> a tiller <WH5647> of the ground. <WH127>

And in process <WH4480> <WH7093> of time <WH3117> it came to pass, <WH1961> that Cain <WH7014> brought <WH935> of the fruit <WH4480> <WH6529> of the ground <WH127> an offering <WH4503> unto the LORD. <WH3068>

And Abel, <WH1893> he <WH1931> also <WH1571> brought <WH935> of the firstlings <WH4480> <WH1062> of his flock <WH6629> and of the fat <WH4480> <WH2459> thereof. And the LORD <WH3068> had respect <WH8159> unto <WH413> Abel <WH1893> and to <WH413> his offering: <WH4503>

But unto <WH413> Cain <WH7014> and to <WH413> his offering <WH4503> he had not respect. <WH8159> <WH3808> And Cain <WH7014> was very <WH3966> wroth, <WH2734> and his countenance <WH6440> fell. <WH5307>
And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Cain, <WH7014> Why <WH4100> art thou wroth? <WH2734> and why <WH4100> is thy countenance <WH6440> fallen? <WH5307>

If <WH518> thou doest well, <WH3190> shalt thou not <WH3808> be accepted? <WH7613> and if <WH518> thou doest not <WH3808> well, <WH3190> sin <WH2403> lieth <WH7257> at the door. <WH6607> And unto <WH413> thee shall be his desire, <WH8669> and thou <WH859> shalt rule <WH4910> over him.

And Cain <WH7014> talked <WH559> with <WH413> Abel <WH1893> his brother: <WH251> and it came to pass, <WH1961> when they were <WH1961> in the field, <WH7704> that Cain <WH7014> rose up <WH6965> against <WH413> Abel <WH1893> his brother, <WH251> and slew <WH2026> him.

And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Cain, <WH7014> Where <WH335> is Abel <WH1893> thy brother? <WH251> And he said, <WH559> I know <WH3045> not: <WH3808> Am I <WH595> my brother's <WH251> keeper? <WH8104>
And he said, <WH559> What <WH4100> hast thou done? <WH6213> the voice <WH6963> of thy brother's <WH251> blood <WH1818> crieth <WH6817> unto <WH413> me from <WH4480> the ground. <WH127>

And now <WH6258> art thou <WH859> cursed <WH779> from <WH4480> the earth, <WH127> which <WH834> hath opened <WH6475> <WH853> her mouth <WH6310> to receive <WH3947> thy brother's <WH251> <WH853> blood <WH1818> from thy hand; <WH4480> <WH3027>

When <WH3588> thou tillest <WH5647> <WH853> the ground, <WH127> it shall not <WH3808> henceforth <WH3254> yield <WH5414> unto thee her strength; <WH3581> a fugitive <WH5128> and a vagabond <WH5110> shalt thou be <WH1961> in the earth. <WH776>
And Cain <WH7014> said <WH559> unto <WH413> the LORD, <WH3068> My punishment <WH5771> is greater <WH1419> than I can bear. <WH4480> <WH5375>

Behold, <WH2005> thou hast driven me out <WH1644> <WH853> this day <WH3117> from <WH4480> <WH5921> the face <WH6440> of the earth; <WH127> and from thy face <WH4480> <WH6440> shall I be hid; <WH5641> and I shall be <WH1961> a fugitive <WH5128> and a vagabond <WH5110> in the earth; <WH776> and it shall come to pass, <WH1961> that every one <WH3605> that findeth <WH4672> me shall slay <WH2026> me.

And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto him, Therefore <WH3651> whosoever <WH3605> slayeth <WH2026> Cain, <WH7014> vengeance shall be taken <WH5358> on him sevenfold. <WH7659> And the LORD <WH3068> set <WH7760> a mark <WH226> upon Cain, <WH7014> lest <WH1115> any <WH3605> finding <WH4672> him should kill <WH5221> him.
And Cain <WH7014> went out <WH3318> from the presence <WH4480> <WH6440> of the LORD, <WH3068> and dwelt <WH3427> in the land <WH776> of Nod, <WH5113> on the east <WH6926> of Eden. <WH5731>

And Cain <WH7014> knew <WH3045> <WH853> his wife; <WH802> and she conceived, <WH2029> and bore <WH3205> <WH853> Enoch: <WH2585> and he built <WH1961> <WH1129> a city, <WH5892> and called <WH7121> the name <WH8034> of the city, <WH5892> after the name <WH8034> of his son, <WH1121> Enoch. <WH2585>

And unto Enoch <WH2585> was born <WH3205> <WH853> Irad: <WH5897> and Irad <WH5897> begot <WH3205> <WH853> Mehujael: <WH4232> and Mehujael <WH4232> begot <WH3205> <WH853> Methusael: <WH4967> and Methusael <WH4967> begot <WH3205> <WH853> Lamech. <WH3929>
And Lamech <WH3929> took <WH3947> unto him two <WH8147> wives: <WH802> the name <WH8034> of the one <WH259> was Adah, <WH5711> and the name <WH8034> of the other <WH8145> Zillah. <WH6741>
And Adah <WH5711> bore <WH3205> <WH853> Jabal: <WH2989> he <WH1931> was <WH1961> the father <WH1> of such as dwell <WH3427> in tents, <WH168> and of such as have cattle. <WH4735>
And his brother's <WH251> name <WH8034> was Jubal: <WH3106> he <WH1931> was <WH1961> the father <WH1> of all <WH3605> such as handle <WH8610> the harp <WH3658> and organ. <WH5748>

And Zillah, <WH6741> she <WH1931> also <WH1571> bore <WH3205> <WH853> Tubal-cain, <WH8423> an instructor <WH3913> of every <WH3605> artificer <WH2794> in brass <WH5178> and iron: <WH1270> and the sister <WH269> of Tubal-cain <WH8423> was Naamah. <WH5279>

And Lamech <WH3929> said <WH559> unto his wives, <WH802> Adah <WH5711> and Zillah, <WH6741> Hear <WH8085> my voice; <WH6963> ye wives <WH802> of Lamech, <WH3929> hearken <WH238> unto my speech: <WH565> for <WH3588> I have slain <WH2026> a man <WH376> to my wounding, <WH6482> and a young man <WH3206> to my hurt. <WH2250>
If <WH3588> Cain <WH7014> shall be avenged <WH5358> sevenfold, <WH7659> truly Lamech <WH3929> seventy <WH7657> and sevenfold. <WH7651>

And Adam <WH121> knew <WH3045> <WH853> his wife <WH802> again; <WH5750> and she bore <WH3205> a son, <WH1121> and called <WH7121> his <WH853> name <WH8034> Seth: <WH8352> For <WH3588> God, <WH430> said she, hath appointed <WH7896> me another <WH312> seed <WH2233> instead of <WH8478> Abel, <WH1893> whom Cain <WH7014> slew. <WH2026>

And to Seth, <WH8352> to him <WH1931> also <WH1571> there was born <WH3205> a son; <WH1121> and he called <WH7121> <WH853> his name <WH8034> Enos: <WH583> then <WH227> began <WH2490> men to call <WH7121> upon the name <WH8034> of the LORD. <WH3068>
